text: We use ChatGPT for writing and AWS for cloud hosting.
Our stack includes Python, Docker, and Kubernetes for orchestration.
The team deployed using Terraform and monitored with Grafana.
We're testing Claude and GPT-4 for our chatbot development.
The backend is built with FastAPI and uses PostgreSQL for the database.
We use GitHub Actions for CI/CD and deploy to Vercel.
The data pipeline uses Apache Spark and stores results in Snowflake.
Our frontend is built with React and styled using Tailwind CSS.
We containerize applications with Docker and orchestrate using Kubernetes.
The team uses Slack for communication and Jira for project management.
